stage.heading: There's nothing basic about our underwear
stage.lead: Discover the features that truly make our undergarments next-generation.
stage.copy: Most menâ€™s underwear brands are only differentiated by the name on the waistband. We cringe every time we hear underwear referred to as "basics". Our innovative products are the result of countless hours spent working on R&D to ensure they stand up to the claims we make.

feature-rows.title: Fit
feature-rows.text: Longer, tapered design hugs the lower torso to prevent bunching and <abbr title="Excess Fabric Gut" class="popover-trigger" data-title="Excess Fabric Gut" data-placement="top" data-trigger="click">EFG</abbr>.

feature-rows.title: Control
feature-rows.text: Moves with you, while being invisible under your outter shirts.

feature-rows.title: Stay Dry
feature-rows.text: Controls your body temperature to keep you cool and confident all day.

feature-rows.title: Second Skin Feel
feature-rows.text: Silky soft and lightweight fabric for an enhanced feel
